page.title: 17Upottery School Games 2
page.content: {Skipping Games. }A number of skipping games are played where two people hold a rope and others skip over it,usually one at a time.There are lots of different songs and rhmes to accompany the skipping such as {I Like Coffee/I {Like Tea, On the Hillside and Teddy {Bear -Teddy Bear. { Ball Games. Cricket,French Cricket, {Football,Tennis and Rounders}are played .We also play a variation of rounders called {Stop},a type of { {Squash}without racquets,(kicking a ball against a wall) and recently a catching game called{Chipped, Cracked {Broken. Other games are:{Poison}, played by a group who make a circle with a coat in the centre and they try to pull each other on to it.{Polo}is a game where you do all sorts of handstands.
